lead_paragraph: The light flyweight Luis Yanez was kicked off the United States Olympic boxing team for skipping three weeks of residency training without permission and without telling USA Boxing where he was, the national team coach, Dan Campbell, said Tuesday.
snippet: The light flyweight Luis Yanez was kicked off the United States Olympic boxing team for skipping three weeks of residency training without permission and without telling USA Boxing where he was, the national team coach, Dan Campbell, said Tuesday.
